enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Pre-registration is reserved for Sociology Majors and Minors.
title: WCAS SOCIOL 303-0-20 Analysis and Interpretation of Social Data
class_attributes:
Formal Studies Distro Area

Prerequisites apply, see description

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course provides an in-depth introduction to the analysis and interpretation of data. We'll walk through basic statistical concepts to understand and analyze patterns in data. By the end of the course, students will be able to conduct analysis on data sets and will be ready to undertake a senior thesis, if interested.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
During preregistration this course is only open to Sociology Majors & Minors.

This course is open to all undergraduates during regular registration.

subject: SOCIOL
